channel.title: New grand exchange map update along with edge
channel.description:
What do you guys think about the new map update for the grand exchange and edgeville? I think it's pretty great, if you think it's good or not good leave a comment here...
[img]http://img52.imageshack.us/img52/6740/shinobiproduction161.png[/img]
NOTE: The picture posted is not my work what so ever.

item.title: New grand exchange map update along with edge
item.dc:creator: @OmgItsShane Shane
item.description:
@OmgItsShane wrote:

shit.
(G.e is pretty cool though like the fountain edgevil sucks ass)

Read full topic

item.title: New grand exchange map update along with edge
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“gravenfire23, post:20, topic:409105”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=510388.msg3703693#msg3703693 date=1312909335]

This shit is laggy as hell. I went to Edgeville and I was lagging like fuck in SD w/ safe mode.

I’m playing on hHD I’m not lagging much at all?

Lags for me ;S
2gb of RAM & I’m hosting a memory leaked piece of shit.
[/quote]I wasnt lagging at all when i was playing directly through runescape website but when i load up rsbuddy im lagging like hell and stuff isnt rendering properly.[/quote]
true, I guess the bot is bad or something.

Read full topic

item.title: New grand exchange map update along with edge
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

Rich:

The only things I find cheesy are some of the NPCs and the current character models, the area graphical updates always look good and are my favorite updates.

I usually enjoy the area updates, but I’m not really a fan of the new layout of the GE.

Read full topic

I don’t care about maps, I just want fingers and eyes that dont look like I’m a fucked up demon in hd.

They’re changing them soon I guess.

RuneScape was way overdue for a graphical overhaul. The problem is that they didn’t do a very good job of it, and made everything look cheesy.

item.source: New grand exchange map update along with edge

item.title: New grand exchange map update along with edge
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Travas, post:50, topic:409105”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=510388.msg3705816#msg3705816 date=1313025055]I remember them interviewing evil chicken and what not.
[/quote]

I was searching through one of the old databases I have, and I found all the old god letters and Postbags.

Here is the bit on the Evil Chicken you were talking about:

Dear Evil chiken,
How did you become evil? How did you…Get to level 121 unlike Your level one brothers. And the last and most important question! Does chicken feed taste good?

Strangely your questions are all one and the same! Why do the other chickens fear me and call me evil? Why am I so high levelled? It’s because I HATE the taste of chicken feed…

No, I have a MUCH tastier food that I enjoy to eat, that makes me big and strong, and keeps my feathers so shiny and clean…

I LOOOOOVE roast chicken!

Yum-yum, with a dash of garlic and a sprinkling of herbs and spices, I could eat it alllll day long… MUHAHAHAH! Bwuk bwuk bwuk.

I even have the picture of the Evil Chicken from that very same issue.

They were so much fun to read back then… :rolleyes:[/quote]
Googled the god letters like you said, check this out, they had the SAME problems 10 years ago!

Read full topic
item.source: New grand exchange map update along with edge

item.title: New grand exchange map update along with edge
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

Davidi2:

People like the old graphics because of the memories attached to it, not for the look tbh.

I find the older graphics to be more matured. A prime example of the nu-rs kid graphics:

Gnome_attacking.png349×550

Read full topic

item.title: New grand exchange map update along with edge
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

reyx7:

I remember them interviewing evil chicken and what not.

I was searching through one of the old databases I have, and I found all the old god letters and Postbags.

Here is the bit on the Evil Chicken you were talking about:

Dear Evil chiken, How did you become evil? How did you...Get to level 121 unlike Your level one brothers. And the last and most important question! Does chicken feed taste good?

Strangely your questions are all one and the same! Why do the other chickens fear me and call me evil? Why am I so high levelled? It’s because I HATE the taste of chicken feed…

No, I have a MUCH tastier food that I enjoy to eat, that makes me big and strong, and keeps my feathers so shiny and clean…

I LOOOOOVE roast chicken!

Yum-yum, with a dash of garlic and a sprinkling of herbs and spices, I could eat it alllll day long… MUHAHAHAH! Bwuk bwuk bwuk.


I even have the picture of the Evil Chicken from that very same issue.

They were so much fun to read back then… :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: New grand exchange map update along with edge
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:48, topic:409105”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=510388.msg3705747#msg3705747 date=1313021867]
People like the old graphics because of the memories attached to it, not for the look tbh.
[/quote]
Nah, I liked everything. Like spells. Now they look like some midget fuck downy gay ass air bending shit…

And alot of other stuff D:

Plus less lag.[/quote]

Amen to that.
who remembers the skeleton and the knight?

shit, that reminds me. It wasn’t postbag from the hedge or w\e the fuck it’s called, it was some segment before it. They would interview npcs around RS. It had a different name. Anyway, I remember them interviewing evil chicken and what not. But the best was when they did it with the HD graphic skeleton. So random, it was great. Anyone help me in my moment of nostalgia?

Read full topic

item.title: New grand exchange map update along with edge
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“T4_, post:38, topic:409105”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=510388.msg3705096#msg3705096 date=1312983808]

looks like shit, especially edgeville.
[/quote]Trololo, in reality it looks awesome.

i like the shit gfx rs.

24gm98o.jpg790×528

!!![/quote]
No slayer, farming, summoning or dungeoneering. Fatigue shown in that box, and the text looks about 200 years old. No box for music, and the logout button has it’s own spot. The good 'ol days.

Read full topic
